title.en: I Just Want to Mooch off Your Luck

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Jiù Xiǎng Cèng Nǐ De Qì Yùn

altTitles.en: I Just Want to Freeload on Your Luck

description.en: After being reborn, Zhao Mingxi had no choice but to mooch off of Fu group's young master's luck to avoid death by terminal illness. Although his ears would turn so red as if they're bleeding whenever he sees her, he still keeps up an act of prideful indifference: "Can you stop being so clingy?"  The next day, Zhao Mingxi really did leave to mooch off of someone else's luck. The small dog bowed his head down, and grumbled: "I'll let you cling to me, alright? Happy now?"
description.zh: 重生后的赵明溪为了避开绝症活下去，不得不去蹭傅氏太子爷身上的气运。 这位太子爷每次看到她，明明耳朵快红得滴血，还要装出酷炫狂霸拽的样子：“你能不能别缠我？” 第二天赵明溪就真的去找别人蹭气运了。:) 小狼狗头低了下来，委委屈屈：“给你缠还不行吗？”

altTitles.ru: Величайший в истории младший сын маркиза

altTitles.en: Legendary Youngest Son of the Marquis House
The Margravial Household's Phenomenal Youngest Son

altTitles.es-la: El legendario hijo menor de la casa del marqués

description.en:
After getting revenge on the Thulcaan Empire, Jack Valantier took his last breath. But just when he thinks it's all over, he finds himself transported back to when he was 14!

From his negligent and wicked family to his loyal servant and caring sister, it's all just as he had remembered. But this time, Jack is armed to the teeth with decades of experience from his previous life! He's ready to give them hell, and those that have wronged him will pay dearly.

Because this time, he's invincible.
description.ja: 名望ある侯爵家の末息子、ジャック・バレンティエ。 他人よりも冷たい家族の中で唯一頼れたのは姉だけだった。 一家が滅びようと未練はなかったが、姉の死が無駄な犠牲だったとわかってから、復讐だけが目的の剣鬼となった。 遂に西大陸を支配するトゥルカン帝国を倒し戦場の怪物となった時、目の前に迫った死を謙虚に受け止める… ところが!! 14歳の過去に人生回帰！ そうだ、これは後悔だらけだった過去をやり直すチャンスだ。 今世ではもう二度と、大切な人たちを失ったりはしない！
description.ko:
명망있는 후작가의 막내아들 잭 발란티에.
남들 보다 못한 가족들 사이에서 유일하게 의지했던 건 누나 뿐!
가문 따위야 멸문을 하든 말든 미련이 없었지만,
누나의 죽음이 헛된 희생인 걸 알게 된 후,
오로지 복수만을 위한 검귀가 되었다.
마침내 서대륙을 지배하는
돌칸 제국을 무너뜨리고, 시산혈해 위의 괴물이 되었을 땐,
다가온 죽음을 겸허히 받아 들였다.

그런데!

14살, 과거로 돌아왔다!
그래, 이건 후회뿐이던 과거를 바로 잡을 기회다.
이번 생엔 두 번 다시 내 사람들을 잃지 않겠다!

후작가의 역대급 막내아들의 통쾌한 회귀 스토리가 시작된다!!
description.pt-br:
Eu vim para cá apenas com o objetivo de vingança. Eu derrubei o Império Tulkan, uma única nação que dominava o continente. Eu sempre consegui obter a vitória. Eu tinha realizado tudo o que precisava e estava satisfeito. É por isso que aceitei minha morte que se aproximava. Eu não tinha mais uma razão para viver. E assim meu coração parou de bater. Eu definitivamente senti isso parar. No entanto, o que aconteceu no mundo? "Não é magia negra e também não parece uma ilusão." Um menino com cabelos curtos e pretos foi refletido no espelho. Eu parecia exatamente como quando eu tinha 14 anos, que foi há 20 anos. 

Um menino, que ainda não perdeu a gordura do bebê, acariciou suas bochechas e murmurou: "Como isso é possível?". Eu tinha voltado. Ao tempo cheio dos meus arrependimentos.

description.en: 300 years ago, Martial God Hyun-oh Kim defeated Barche, the boss of the tower of destruction, and prevented the end of the world. Kim Hyun-oh, should have died suffering the same fate as the tower of destruction. However, after 300 years, he is reborn as the 17-year-old Kim Joo-hyuk. In the midst, he finds out that the “Constellations”, that were created during his absence, are his disciples from 300 years ago and sets on a journey to find them.

altTitles.ja: ダンジョン家事師は断れない！

description.en:
From Baka-Updates:
The return of good looks! And cooking skills on top?!

Lee Heena, an ordinary South Korean office worker, age 25.

Today, another ordinary day completely lost in overtime… is what she thought. Then she suddenly awakened. And then just as suddenly fell into a dungeon.

“God, Buddha, Allah! Please let me awaken as a fighting-type hunter! If possible, a strong one!!”

From the desperate wish, the system responded.

[Congratulations!]

[You have awakened as a hidden class, ‘Housekeeper’ (D)!]

Although Heena’s skills in Plucking Herbs (C), Exterminating Pests (D), This is the Taste of My Magic Touch (D) are very useful in daily life, can she survive with these skills?!

But, what’s this?

Kang Jinhyeon, South Korea’s No. 1 ranking S-Class hunter, tried his hand at flirting.

“I will leave everything I have to you.”

“Hunter Kang Jinhyeon…”

“Yes. Will you take responsibility for me?”

“Why do you ask me to be your housekeeper in such a weird way?!”

Is the simple and ordinary daily life that Heena dreamt of okay?! With a talking snail and moving pet plants ♥
The delightful romance fantasy〈The Housekeeper in the Dungeon〉!
description.pt-br:
O retorno da boa aparência! E habilidades culinárias ainda por cima?!

Lee Heena, uma trabalhadora de escritório sul-coreana comum, de 25 anos.

Hoje, mais um dia comum completamente perdido em horas extras... foi o que ela pensou. Então ela acordou de repente. E então, de repente, caiu em uma masmorra.

“Deus, Buda, Alá! Por favor, deixe-me despertar como um caçador do tipo lutador! Se possível, um forte!!

Do desejo desesperado, o sistema respondeu.

[Parabéns!]

[Você despertou como uma classe oculta, 'Governanta' (D)!]

Embora as habilidades de Heena em Arrancar Ervas (C), Exterminar Pragas (D), Este é o Gosto do Meu Toque Mágico (D) sejam muito útil na vida diária, ela conseguirá sobreviver com essas habilidades?!

Mas, o que é isso?

Kang Jinhyeon, o caçador de classe S número 1 da Coreia do Sul, tentou flertar.

“Vou deixar tudo o que tenho para você.”

“Caçador Kang Jinhyeon…”

“Sim. Você assumirá a responsabilidade por mim?

“Por que você me pede para ser sua governanta de uma forma tão estranha?!”

A vida cotidiana simples e comum com a qual Heena sonhou está bem?! Com um caracol falante e plantas de estimação em movimento ♥

description.en: A huge incident happens to Arika, the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!
description.ja: 人気急上昇中のアイドルグループのセンター・アリカの身に起きた大事件。犯人はファンか、それとも‥‥。華々しいアイドル業界の光と闇が今暴かれる！
description.vi:
Mamiya Arika, nữ hát chính của nhóm nhạc thần tượng "Lyrical Trick" bỗng mất tích một cách bí ẩn. Và đầu mối duy nhất về dấu vết của cô chỉ đơn giản là một đoạn video camera an ninh.
Liệu đây có đơn giản chỉ là hành vi của một fan hâm mộ quá khích, một idol otaku hay không...!?

altTitles.ja: ゴールデンスパークル

description.en: With an absent father and having had a traumatic experience in pre-school, Himari Uehara has problems dealing with girls, and knows nothing about sexuality. He joins a boys-only high school, makes a good friend, and his now happy school life is marred only by the disconcerting changes in his body. His new friend, Gaku Asada, realizing Himari's ignorance, offers to teach Himari how to take care of his male physical needs…
description.tr:
Lise birinci sınıf öğrencisi Himari Uehara, seks hakkında çok az bilgiye sahip… Babası evde olmayan ve ortaokulda verilen sağlık dersinden kaytaran Himari, boxerıyla beklemediği bir durumda uyanır ve bu konuda tavsiye verecek kimsesi olmadığından kafası karışır. Neyse ki Himari, ona sağlık dersinde kaçırdığı her şeyi ve hatta daha fazlasını öğretmeyi teklif eden yeni arkadaşı Gaku Asada'ya sahip…   
(Luna Scans TR)

altTitles.ja: きみは, ニーナじゃない
きみは ニーナじゃない

description.en: The only solace for this young man, who has withdrawn into his own shell after a heartbreak, is watching his "idol" on stream. Then one day, he suddenly finds himself hiding from a girl who turns out to be his "idol"...? A life-changing romance between a heartbroken boy and a streamer begins!
description.pt-br: O único consolo para este jovem, que se retirou para a sua própria concha após uma decepção, é ver o sua “idol” em transmissão. Então, um dia, ele de repente se vê se escondendo de uma garota que acaba por ser sua "idol"...? Começa um romance transformador entre um garoto de coração partido e uma streamer!

description.en:
Manga artist Toratoki Yamamura's serialized work "Revenge Clown'' has been decided to be made into a movie, and with the support of his beloved wife, he is having the best night in both his professional and private life. However, that was just the beginning of the nightmare that was about to begin...
What is the unexperienced murderous intent called by unconscious malice? ? What is the true identity of the mysterious revenge demon "Clown Man"? ?
Suspense-horror master Shingo Honda collaborates for the first time with Shinsuke Takahashi, a master of writing, to unleash an astonishing and earth-shattering ``wet-clothed'' suspense story! !

altTitles.ja: みつばものがたり 呪いの少女と死の輪舞《ロンド》

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitsuba no Monogatari - Noroi no Shoujo to Shi no Rondo

altTitles.en: Mitsuba's Stories - The Cursed Girl and the Circle-Dance of Death (Rondo)

description.en:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

altTitles.th: เทพเกรียน โรงเรียนมัธยม

altTitles.ja: ゴッド・オブ・ハイスクール

description.en:
While an island half-disappearing from the face of the earth, a mysterious organization is sending out invitations for a tournament to every skilled fighter in the world. If you win you can have ANYTHING you want.  
They're recruiting only the best to fight the best and claim the title of The God of High School!

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.en: Starting Today She's My Childhood Friend

altTitles.zh-hk: 從今天開始的青梅竹馬

altTitles.zh: 从今天开始的青梅竹马

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)

altTitles.vi: Fairy Tail Nhiệm vụ Trăm năm

altTitles.th: แฟรี่เทล ภาคเควส 100 ปี ตอนที่

altTitles.ja: フェアリーテイル １００年クエスト

altTitles.zh-hk: 妖精的尾巴 百年任務

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

---

- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

altTitles.en: I show my true colors shining through.
There Are Clothes I Want to Wear

description.en:
University student Mami is seen by everyone as the fashionable cool model-type but she secretly just wants to wear Lolita fashion.  
  
While she tries occasionally to be more cute & less "stylish", she can't overcome the image others have of her. When she watches a new coworker at the cafe she works part-time at leave in a extremely flashy outfit, it sparks the courage in her to express herself more truthfully too!

title.en: Hazure Waku no Joutai Ijou Skill de Saikyou ni Natta Ore ga Subete wo Juurin Suru made

altTitles.en: Failure Frame: I Became the Strongest and Annihilated Everything With Low-Level Spells

altTitles.ru: Я стал самым сильным с провальным навыком 【 ненормальное состояние】, я разрушу всё

altTitles.ja: ハズレ枠の【状態異常スキル】で最強になった俺がすべてを蹂躙するまで

altTitles.ko: 꽝취급 받는 [상태이상 스킬]로 최강이 된 내가 전부 유린할 때까지

altTitles.zh: 最强的我最终蹂躏一切

altTitles.zh-hk: 靠廢柴技能【狀態異常】成為最強的我將蹂躪一切

description.en: During the school trip Touka and his classmates are summoned to another world. However, Touka was the only one with the lowest rank: E-rank - an extremely low status compared to his classmates. Thus the former mob-character and abandoned hero, will absolutely become the strongest devil as he advances and strikes back.
description.pt:
Durante a viagem escolar Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank-E - um status extremamente baixo em comparação com seus colegas de classe. Assim, o personagem secundário e herói abandonado, se tornara o mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.


---

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   
"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   
The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…  


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (AC QQ)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/648136)
- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)

'Sonidor', a dream artisan who enters into other people's dreams through physical contact and grants wishes that could not be fulfilled in reality. One day, the emperor suddenly arrives at the house and asks to wake up the crown prince who has fallen into eternal sleep. "I want you to wake him up."

Sonidor enters the dream of 'Marmel', the crown prince who is praised by everyone for his gentle nature and beautiful appearance, but somehow Marmel's dream is gloomy and desolate. “You were just going to kill me?!” 

According to the taste of the prince who hates people, Sonidor turns into various animals and finds the reason why Marmel fell asleep one by one, and Marmel gradually opens his heart to Sonidor... "Your Highness, do you believe me?" Will Sonidor be able to wake Marmel from his eternal sleep?
description.pl: "Będę trzymać jego ręce, by obudzić go z wiecznego snu"  Sodinor, ekspert do spraw snów, ma umiejętność spełnienia marzeń nawet w świecie snów. Na rozkaz cesarza została wprowadzona do snu księcia Marmella, który nie mógł się obudzić.  Jednak w snach księcia, który znany jest ze swojej dobroci i łagodności, jest coś bardzo dziwnego. Jego kraina marzeń jest opuszona i bezbarwna.   Sonidor infiltrując sny Marmella pod postacią uroczego zwierzątka udaje się znaleźć powód jego długiego letargu...  Czy Marmell obudzi się w końcu z wiecznego snu?

altTitles.vi: Tối Cường Phản Sáo Lộ Hệ Thống

description.en:
Scamming all day, every day, often venturing alone. He bluffs to get the ultimate power in this cultivation world?! world traveler Xue Que doesn’t always bluff, but he needs to.  
  
"Before you get your hopes up, The Character is Absolute Garbage, The Manhua is Pure comedy at best… The plot ehhh not so much"  
  
Term : META Stands for (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming is any strategy, action or method used in a game which transcends a prescribed ruleset, uses external factors to affect the game, or goes beyond the supposed limits or environment set by the game. Another definition refers to the game universe outside of the game itself. *(citation needed)*
description.fr:
Escroquer toute la journée, tous les jours, souvent en s'aventurant seul. Il bluffe pour obtenir le pouvoir ultime dans ce monde de culture ! Le voyageur du monde Xue Que ne bluffe pas toujours, mais il en a besoin.

Terme : META signifie (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming est la stratégie, l'action ou la méthode utilisée dans un jeu qui transcende un ensemble de règles prescrit, utilise des facteurs externes pour affecter le jeu, ou va au-delà des limites supposées ou l'environnement établi par le jeu. Une autre définition fait référence à l'univers du jeu en dehors du jeu lui-même.

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

title.en: I'm in Love with the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 我的首推是恶役大小姐

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的首推是惡役大小姐

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shǒutuī shì è yì dà xiǎojiě

altTitles.th: ทำไงดีเกมนี้นางร้ายน่ารัก

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Oshi wa Akuyaku Reijou.

altTitles.es-la: Mi Oshi Es Una Villa Noble

description.de:
Oohashi Rei - eigentlich eine ganz normale Büroangestellte - wacht eines Tages im Körper der Protagonistin ihres absoluten Lieblingsspiels "Revolution" auf. Eigentlich geht es in dem Spiel darum, mit einem von drei absolut wundervollen Prinzen zusammenzukommen. Ein klassisches Otome-Game, und wenn es nach Rei geht, auch das mit Abstand beste.  
Ihr Hauptinteresse lag dabei jedoch nicht etwa an einem der männlichen Charaktere, sondern an Claire François, der Antagonistin des Spiels.

Wird Rei es schaffen, eine romantische Beziehung zu ihr aufzubauen? Wie werden die eigentlichen Stars des Spiels, die drei Prinzen, auf diese Situation reagieren?  
Und was hält Claire überhaupt davon?
description.en:
Ordinary office worker Oohashi Rei wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favourite otome game, *Revolution*. To her delight, the first person to greet her is also her favourite character, Claire François – the main antagonist of the story!

Now, Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game’s male leads. But how will her villainous lady love react to this new courtship?!
description.fr:
Rei Ôhashi, une simple employée de bureau d’une petite entreprise, se retrouve soudainement dans le corps de l’héroïne de son jeu vidéo de drague préféré, Revolution.
Maintenant sous le nom de Rae Taylor, elle est prête à accomplir son objectif.
Passer du bon temps avec les princes du jeu ? Non.
Son cœur appartient à la méchante de l’histoire, Claire François.
Bien décidée à la chérir et à rester à ses côtés, sa nouvelle vie commence dans un monde empreint de magie !
description.id: Seorang pegawai kantor biasa, Oohashi Rei, bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang Heroine bernama Rei Taylor di Game Otome favoritnya, "Revolution". Kebetulan lagi, orang pertama yang menyambutnya adalah karakter favoritnya, Claire Francois- antagonis dari cerita ini! Kini Rei bertekad untuk membangun hubungan romantis dengan Claire, bukan dengan pemeran utama pria. Lantas, bagaimanakah gadis jahat yang dia cintai akan bereaksi terhadap kemesraan baru ini?!
description.it:
La normale impiegata Oohashi Rei si sveglia nel corpo della protagonista del suo gioco otome preferito, Revolution. Per la sua gioia, la prima persona che incontra è anche il suo personaggio preferito, Claire François, l'antagonista principale della storia! Ora Rei è determinata a perseguire una storia d'amore con Claire piuttosto che con gli interessi amorosi maschili. Ma come reagirà la sua amata antagonista a questo nuovo corteggiamento?!
L'anime debutterà ad ottobre 2023!
Annunciato il manga ufficiale italiano!
description.ja: 乙女ゲーム『Revolution』の世界に、ヒロインのレイ＝テイラーとして転生した社畜OL・大橋零。そんな彼女の推しは攻略対象の王子たち…ではなく、悪役令嬢・クレア＝フランソワだった!　前世でゲームをやりこんでいたレイは、その知識と愛で、クレアとお近づきになることができるのか？
description.es-la: Oohashi Rei, una trabajadora de oficina ordinaria se despierta en el cuerpo de la protagonista de su juego otome favorito, "Revolution". Para su deleite, la primera persona en saludarla es también su personaje favorito, Claire Francois, ¡la principal antagonista de la historia! Ahora, Rei está decidida a enamorarse de Claire en lugar de los protagonistas masculinos del juego. ¿Pero cómo reaccionará la villana ante este nuevo cortejo?

description.en:
A writer suffering from writer's block is encouraged by his editor.  
  
Note: Oneshot is included in Anata o Tabete Ii Desu ka? volume release.

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr wie ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

altTitles.ja: ストロベリーパルフェ おねロリ百合アンソロジー

description.en:
Cover: Hanekoto  
Illustration: Yuama

title.en: I'm Really Not the Evil God's Lackey

altTitles.en: I'm Really Not the Demon God's Lackey
I’m Really Not the Devil’s Lackey

altTitles.uk: Насправді я не слуга Злого Бога

altTitles.vi: Ta Thật Không Phải Tà Thần Chó Săn

description.en: Lin Jie is an otherworlder who manages a bookstore. He’s kind and always recommends soul-healing books for his dejected customers. Sometimes he’d even share his own works too. As time goes on, these customers start to respect him a lot. They bring simple local products every day to show their gratitude and ask for book recommendations. They even start telling tales of this ordinary shopkeeper. His respectful and cordial titles include “Hyena of the Evil God”, “Herald of the Flesh Gospel”, “Author of Cultes des Goules” and “Shepherd of the Stars”???
description.uk: Лінь Цзє – чужоземець з іншого світу, що став тепер звичайним власником книжкового магазину. Він доброзичливий і завжди готовий порекомендувати відвідувачам книги, що здатні зцілити їхні душі. Іноді, він ділиться і власними роботами. З часом, клієнти починають його дуже поважати. Вони щодня приносять йому маленькі сувеніри чи подарунки в знак подяки та просять у нього рекомендації щодо книги. Про цього звичайного крамаря навіть починають розповідати історії. Його з повагою та теплом звуть «Гієна Злого Бога», «Вісник Євангелія Плоті», «Автор Культу Упирів» та «Пастух Зірок».
description.zh: 穿越者林介经营着一家书店。他善良热情，总是向失意潦倒的客人们推荐治愈心灵的书籍，偶尔也会安利一下自己的拙作。久而久之，这些客人变得非常尊敬他，每天都会带来一些朴实的土特产报答他，向他请教推荐书目，并且向周边人也诉说着这个普通书店老板的事迹。他们尊敬而亲切地称呼他为——“邪神的鬣狗”、“血肉福音书的传播者”、“尸食教典仪的撰写者”、“群星的牧羊人”。“？？？”

description.en:
Sunghoon Lee is nothing but a victim of a changing world, a powerless man in a land infested with beasts and magic. Monsters from another world invaded earth, and they brought with them a sickness that pushes Sunghoon’s mother into an endless sleep. To pay off her medical bills, he braved a dangerous job as bait used by powerful superhumans called Awakeners to hunt monsters. But when he found himself at death’s door, the image of his past life flashes through his mind. There, he found his truth: he is the reincarnation of the Sorcerer King!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.fr:
La planète a été envahie par des monstres, que seuls les sorciers peuvent chasser. Notre héros, simple humain, n'a pas vraiment d'autre choix que de jouer le rôle d’appât dans les chasses s’il veut un salaire décent. Mais un jour, blessé par une de ces créatures et sur le point de mourir, il se rappelle sa vie antérieure… en tant que roi des sorciers, rien que ça ! Armé de ses souvenirs et de ses nouveaux pouvoirs, sa vie devrait vite devenir intéressante.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.ja:
10年前、次元が拗れてモンスターが溢れ出た。 同時に生まれたモンスター覚醒者たちは→モンスターを捕まえて大活躍をする。 「吉澤覚」は月に4回、お母さんの病院代を工面するために 覚醒者のハンティングを手伝って、 後処理をする危険千万の「ポーター」として活動をする。 そんな中でモンスターに大きな怪我を負ってから前世の記憶が戻ってくる… ”ん？俺死んだのか？” ”俺は前世に大魔導士のクラトゥラスだったじゃん！！” 前世の記憶を持った「吉澤覚」のパワハラ魔法が始まる！

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.ko:
10년 전, 차원이 비틀리며 몬스터가 쏟아져 나왔다.
동시에 생겨난 초능력 각성자들이 몬스터를 잡으며 대세가 되는데...

성훈은 한 달에 네 번, 어머니의 병원비를 마련하기 위해
각성자의 사냥을 돕고, 뒤처리하는 위험천만한 '짐꾼'으로 활동한다.

그러던 중 몬스터에게 큰 부상을 입고 전생을 기억하게 되는데...

"어라, 나 죽었나?"

"나 전생에 대마도사 크라투라스였잖아!!!"

전생의 기억을 가진 성훈의 갑질 마법이 시작된다!!

*********************
판타지 화제작 데카스펠 작가님의 <나는 마도왕이다> 본격 웹툰화!
세계를 휩쓰는 마도왕의 마법을 웹툰으로 만나 보세요!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.ru:
10 лет назад орда монстров из разлома в пространстве и времени начала атаковать человечество. В то же время люди начали пробуждать силу и охотиться на монстров за славой и деньгами. Санхун, нуждающийся в деньгах из-за болезни своей матери, берёт опасную работу, помогая охотиться на этих монстров четыре раза в месяц в качестве приманки. Но однажды, оказавшись тяжело раненным, он вспомнит свою прошлую жизнь.  
«Я что, только что умер? Погоди-ка, я был королём-волшебником Кратра в прошлой жизни?!»

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.pt-br:
10 anos atrás, a horda de monstros da fenda formada da distorção do tempo e espaço iniciaram um ataque contra a humanidade. Ao mesmo tempo que, as pessoas começaram a despertar poderes e iniciaram uma caçada aos monstros em busca de fama e dinheiro. Lee SungHoon, à procura de dinheiro devido à doença de sua mãe, arruma um trabalho altamente perigoso, ajudando na caçada desses monstros bancando a isca para os caçadores, fazendo isso quatro vezes no mês. Mas, um dia, ele é gravemente ferido por um monstro e relembra de sua vida passada como o Rei dos Feiticeiros. "Hã? Eu acabei de morrer? Espera aí, eu era O Rei dos Feiticeiros Kuratauras na minha vida passada?" Com as memórias de sua vida anterior, o espetáculo do poder mágico esmagador de SungHoon se inicia.   

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

description.en:
I’ve always had a fascination with the occult; you might even call it my specialty. I’ve been brought in as a consultant on many supernatural and strange mysteries. But nothing could have prepared me for this house. It seemed so ordinary at first, except for that one room. It had no doors, no windows, and was tucked away, leaving anyone to think it was just a wall. I knew that there was something more to it. It shouldn’t be there, it shouldn’t exist, and yet…

Just what is this house, and what dark secrets does it hold?
description.ja: オカルト専門ライターの「私」は知人から、とある家の間取り図を見せられた。そこには正体不明の「謎の空間」が存在するという。建築設計士・栗原に意見を求めると、彼はこの家のおかしなところを次々に指摘し始めた……！

altTitles.ja: GTO パラダイス・ロスト

description.en: Onizuka is a prisoner. For reasons that he only knows, he tells the story himself of what happened between him and Class G (which is basically an idol class), expect many troubles, adventures and of course many hilarious moments.
A short 4koma published in Game Player Comics Vol. 2, featuring 4 girls and their misadventure in the Battle Game of Bomberman!

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en: <<UBI special award>>Draw the game! Two major brands collaborate for a manga competition! Jump and top game publisher Ubisoft team up for a new manga competition! Four of Ubisoft's biggest games: Assassin's Creed, Watch Dogs, The Division and Far Cry are used as source material. Here are the 5 award-winning works!

altTitles.ja: ーロンズ・ボール・パレード

description.en: Hakuo Gakuin's mighty baseball team consistently makes it to Koshien, and Tamao Azukida dreams of making the team. To achieve his goal, Tamao does extensive research and undergoes a strict daily training regimen. But at tryouts, Tamao meets the enigmatic genius pitcher Tao Ryudo, and the course of his destiny may be forever changed! If people aren't laughing, then you're not dreaming big enough! A new baseball tale for the era begins!

“Who am I?!”  
  
Leaving only black soot and dead bodies in his wake, Kang Chan, the “God of Blackfield,” struck fear into the hearts of his enemies.

But one day, in the chaos of battle, his life was abruptly snuffed out.

“I’ve been shot… but the bullet came from behind me!”

Revived three years later, this “god” is now a wimpy high schooler with major problems — savage bullies, shady business dealings, and even girls.

Revenge seemed like a straight shot, but high school is a battlefield all of its own!
description.pt-br: "Quem sou eu?" A lenda da Legião Estrangeira Francesa, 'Kang Chan'! Durante a guerra Africana, ele era chamado de 'Rei do Blackfield', o deus da terra negra, o qual os seus inimigos tinham temor e medo. Porém, durante uma missão para matar Masallan, o cérebro por trás do SISS, o grupo de defensores sunitas, Kang Chan foi morto em combate por um tiro vindo de trás dele. Enquanto sua visão embaçava, ele viu os treze membros de seu batalhão, que tinham absoluta fé nele, sendo mortos um após o outro. Enquanto Kang Chan aguardava a morte depois de ter sido atingido por um traidor, ele foi salvo por um poder misterioso e acordou 3 anos depois na Coréia do Sul. Contudo, ele estava no corpo de outro 'Kang Chan', um garoto de 19 anos no ensino médio que era ameaçado na escola. A jornada de Kang Chan para conseguir se vingar do traidor e descobrir a verdade por trás do seu renascimento começa agora!

description.en: The girl who was adopted by two mothers met her soulmate- another girl, when she was 16 years old. After dating for ten years, she decided to give herself to a man at the age of 28 … because she did not want to live this "abnormal life". Only after leaving her, did she finally understand the true meaning of love during those countless days and nights. However, can they still go back to the way things were?

altTitles.ja: バーン・ザ・ウィッチ

description.en:
The story centers on Noel Niihashi and Ninny Spangcole, who work as witches at the Wing Bird headquarters in Reverse London's Natural Dragon Management Agency. Those who live in Reverse London are able to see supernatural creatures such as dragons. Noel and Nini work to help promote coexistence between these creatures and humans, but sometimes must undergo missions to exterminate evil creatures.  
  
[Official anime site](https://burn-the-witch-anime.com/en/)


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Glénat](https://www.glenat.com/manga/series/burn-witch)
- In Indonesian by [m&c! Comics](https://www.gramedia.com/products/burn-the-witch-01)
- In Italian by [Planet Manga](https://www.panini.it/shp_ita_it/burn-the-witch-1-mmgno122-it08.html)
description.pt: Existem duas londres… A normal e a Reversa… Na segunda existem dragões, bruxas e todo um incrível mundo criado pelo mesmo criador de Bleach, Kubo Tite! Descubra-o lendo agora!!!
description.ru: История двух ведьм, которые работают в Ином Лондоне - в западном филиале общества душ, в том же мире, что и персонажи аниме "Bleach".

altTitles.ja: ボーンコレクション

description.en: In a world swarming with yokai demons… One day, mediocre exorcist Kazami encounters a beautiful girl named Paira. But who is she?! And could the seemingly useless Kazami actually have a special ability? Get ready for a new generation of yokai battle comedy manga!
description.pt: Em um mundo repleto de demônios yokai… Um dia, o exorcista medíocre Kazami encontra uma linda garota chamada Paira. Mas quem é ela?! E poderia o Kazami aparentemente inútil, realmente ter uma habilidade especial? Prepare-se para uma nova geração de mangá de comédia de batalha yokai!

description.ar:
بعد وفاة والديه، تُرك الشاب ميراي كاكيهاشي في رعاية أقاربه الذين يسيئون معاملته. وبسبب ذلك، غدا متشائمًا ومكتئبًا، محاولًا الانتحار مساء تخرّجه من المدرسة الإعدادية. لكن مع ذلك، قامت فتاة بيضاء نقية اسمها ناسي بإنقاذ ميراي. وكشفت ناسي أنها ملاك وصي يرغب في إعطائه السعادة - من خلال منحه قوى خارقة للطبيعة وفرصة لأن يصبح الإله الجديد.

من أجل الحصول على لقب الإله، يجب عليه هزيمة 12 "مرشح إلهي" آخر خلال 999 يومًا. فيبدأ ميراي صراعًا للبقاء على قيد الحياة حيث اندلعت معركة جماعية مرعبة بينه وبين المرشحين الذين يتطلعون إلى الحصول على أكبر قوة في العالم.
description.en:
After the death of his parents, a young Mirai Kakehashi is left in the care of his abusive relatives. Since then, he has become gloomy and depressed, leading him to attempt suicide on the evening of his middle school graduation. Mirai, however, is saved by a pure white girl named Nasse who introduces herself as a guardian angel wishing to give him happiness—by granting him supernatural powers and a chance to become the new God.  
  
In order to earn the position, he must defeat 12 other "God Candidates" within 999 days. Soon, Mirai begins a struggle to survive as a terrifying battle royale erupts between himself and the candidates looking to obtain the most power in the world.  


---

**Officially published:**  
- In English by [VIZ Media](https://www.viz.com/platinum-end), and on [MangaPlus](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100021)  
- In French by [Kazé](http://minisites.kaze.fr/platinum-end/)  
- In Italian by [Panini Comics](http://comics.panini.it/store/pub_ita_it/mmafi037-it-manga-fight-platinum-end-n-1.html)  
- In German by [Tokyopop](https://www.tokyopop.de/manga/tokyopop-manga/shonen/platinum-end/)  
- In Spanish by [Norma Editorial](https://www.normaeditorial.com/catalogo/S/4472/1/platinum-end/)
description.fr: Mirai, un jeune homme qui a perdu tout espoir en la vie, décide de se suicider en se jetant du haut d'un building. Mais, juste avant qu'il ne touche le sol, un ange, appelé Nasse, le rettrape au vol et lui sauve la vie. Elle lui offre alors la possibilié d'obtenir de puissants pouvoirs, promesses d'une vie meilleure... Mais en acceptant, Mirai découvre qu'il participe désormais à une compétition mortelle...

description.en: A graduate from the school of hard knocks, hit man Ogami faces his greatest challenge yet…middle school!

altTitles.ja: 鴨乃橋ロンの禁断推理

altTitles.es: El misterio prohibido de Ron Kamonohashi

altTitles.th: สืบลับฉบับคาโมโนะฮาชิ รอน

description.en: This unusual duo brings the hidden truth into the light! Ron Kamonohashi, a private investigator with serious issues, and Totomaru Ishiki, a pure-hearted but dim police detective, team up to solve the most baffling mysteries! A thrilling detective story for a new generation from Akira Amano, creator of "Reborn!" and "Ēldlive"!
description.es: ¡Esta pareja de detectives formada por Ron Kamonohashi, un investigador poco ortodoxo, e Isshiki Totomaru, un policía de carácter puro e inocente, deberá resolver el misterio para sacar a la luz una verdad que lleva mucho tiempo enterrada bajo una terrible oscuridad! ¡De la mano de la autora de Katekyo Hitman Reborn y Éldlive llega esta vertiginosa historia de misterios y detectives!
description.ru: Этот необычный дуэт раскроет все тайны! Рон Камонохаши, частный детектив с серьёзными проблемами, и Тотомару Ишики, чистосердечный, но глуповатый детектив полиции, объединяются, чтобы разгадать самые сложные тайны! Захватывающий детектив нового поколения от Акиры Амано, создателя "REBORN" и "ēlDLIVE"!!

description.en:
Zip up and get your robot on! A new type of robot-action series!   
World-famous handsome mechanical engineer Koshiro Tatara and scary-looking musclehead Kaname, these polar opposite twins both fell in love with the same girl's smile. Since then, they compete daily to see which of them can make her smile more.   
But one day, tragedy suddenly strikes Koshiro…   
  
A new robot battle action manga with a totally unlikely duo from Yusaku Shibata, creator of Yoakemono!

altTitles.ja: インサイド (サイモトキ)

description.en: <<Second prize>>Draw the game! Two major brands collaborate for a manga competition! Jump and top game publisher Ubisoft team up for a new manga competition! Four of Ubisoft's biggest games: Assassin's Creed, Watch Dogs, The Division and Far Cry are used as source material. Here are the 5 award-winning works!

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!

title.en: After School Lessons for Unripe Apples

altTitles.en: A 90's Cram School for the Unripened

altTitles.pt-br: Lições após a escola para maçãs não maduras

description.en:
That asshole is back as an entirely new level of asshole!   
  
In her final year of middle school, Hwang Miae is stuck with Kim Cheol, a boy she met briefly years ago - he's her classmate… and her neighbor. Now the other kids keep calling them a couple! In a flurry of uneasiness, Cheol starts to avoid Miae like the plague.   
  
You bastard! Do you think you're the only one going through this?   
  
But it doesn't stop there. Destiny won't leave them alone as Kim Cheol and Hwang Miae keep seeing each other everywhere… causing even more trouble. As strange friends intrude on their relationship, Miae experiences puberty the right way…   
  
A new project of <Cheese In The Trap> author Soonkki!
description.fr: Octobre 1998, Mi-Ae est juste une collégienne normale qui fait de son mieux pour mener une vie relativement tranquille à l'école. Elle aime lire des bandes dessinées, écouter le groupe pop «The Fire Boys», et faire du karaoké. Un jour, un garçon qu'elle connaissait est transféré dans son école et commence à causer des problèmes. Sauf que peu importe ce qu'elle fait, il semblerait qu'il n'apprécie pas les efforts de Mi-Ae pour apprendre à mieux le connaître. Ça veut dire quoi au juste ?!

description.en: Manga about a girl who was looking for a job and ended up in a corporation of magical girls fighting monsters.
description.ja: “魔法少女”――それは、誰もが憧れる「職業」である。　就職活動に苦戦する女子大生・桜木カナ。面接先で怪異に巻き込まれたカナは、駆けつけた魔法少女・越谷を手助けしたことをきっかけに、ベンチャー企業『株式会社マジルミエ』に魔法少女として新卒入社することになり…!?
description.ru: Манга про девочку, которая искала работу и попала в корпорацию девочек-волшебниц, борющихся с монстрами.

altTitles.th: สาปกลืนมนุษย์

description.en: “You just die one day and turn into a mummy!” Mysterious mummified corpses that people have nicknamed “Mummily-sans” keep being found one after another, causing a lot of fuss. One day, a boy named Seita notices that his friend is acting strangely…?! Don’t miss this thrilling suspense story about an invasion by the unknown!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง อยู่เฉยๆ เขาก็กลายเป็นมัมมี่และจบชีวิตลง--” ปริศนาของศพมัมมี่ปรากฏออกมา ทีละร่างๆ ศพเหล่านี้ถูกเรียกว่า“มัมมี่ซัง“และทำให้เกิดความปั่นป่วน ในวันหนึ่ง เด็กหนุ่มชื่อเซตะ สังเกตเห็นพฤติกรรมแปลกๆ ของเพื่อนร่วมชั้น...!? เรื่องราวระทึกขวัญที่ถาโถมเข้ามาโดยที่ไม่เคยรู้มาก่อน!

description.en: Tamako comes for an interview at a ramen shop run only by cats, with no humans. The cat manager asks her if she likes cats, and when Tamako honestly says she is a dog person, she is easily hired. However, her job is not to run a ramen shop, but to look after cats...?
description.ja: 人間のいない、猫だけが営むラーメン屋に面接に来た珠子。猫の店長に猫好きか聞かれ、珠子は正直に犬派と答えるとあっさり採用される。しかし仕事内容はラーメン屋ではなく、猫のお世話係で…!?

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me...!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

altTitles.th: 2.5 มิติ ริริสะ

description.en:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)
description.ja: 現実の女に興味無し！俺の嫁・リリエルは2次元にあり！そんな漫研部長・奥村の前に現れたのは…リアルなリリエル？ドキドキコスプレコメディ開幕！
description.pt:
"Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu Liliel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu… uma Liliel real?  
Uma super comédia empolgante começa!
description.pt-br: "Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu, Liriel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu... uma Liriel real? Uma super comédia empolgante começa!

altTitles.zh-hk: 公主大人，接下來是“拷問”時間

altTitles.zh: 公主大人，接下来是“拷问”时间

description.de:
Die illustre und militärisch begnadete Prinzessin des Königreiches wurde von Schergen des Dämonenfürsten gefangen genommen und in Ketten gelegt. Darauf bedacht, jede auch noch so kleine Information aus ihr herauszupressen, setzt der Dämonenfürst seine Großinquisitorin darauf an, die Prinzessin zum Reden zu bringen.  
  
Kann sie dieser schier endlosen Folter widerstehen? Oder knickt sie bei den Verhören ein und offenbart ihrem erbitterten Feind vitale Informationen über ihr geliebtes Königreich?  
  
Dies ist die Geschichte jener armen Prinzessin und der Qualen, die sie im Zuge der Verhöre erleiden muss.
description.en: The princess who's been held captive by the Demon Lord's army is scheduled to be executed by the Demon Lord's relentless torture!
description.id:
Seorang Putri yang ditahan oleh pasukan Raja Iblis, disiapkan untuk menerima siksaan dari Raja Iblis tanpa henti!  


---

**Links:**  
- [Chapter 1 art](https://i.imgur.com/SaOoznH.png)
